## Source: amazon-inspector (e79387f18b95e5ef7af4d75095dd85e7dedcff2c1e2a068795989cc559bbc695)
The package webswing-directdraw-javascript was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (676a384880e80d721568ff3e30ff4f3eae13de62c61ecec72afdf170758cc67a)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'webswing-directdraw-javascript' @ 1.0.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
